data.title: Celia Cruz: Cuban Soul, Cuban Soil - Becoming An Icon
data.meta_description:
Step into the spotlight with us for the grand finale of our Celia Cruz journey, where we delve into her twilight years: overflowing with awards, accolades, a fistful of Cuban soil, and even a poignant tribute. We'll uncover the profound impact of Celia's music, reflecting on how her voice transcended borders and touched souls worldwide. Whether she had even a glimmer of an idea of where her voice would lead her, Celia Cruz would leave this world having changed it forever. 

Lilliana Vazquez and Joseph Carrillo are the hosts of Becoming An Icon with production support by Nick Milanes, Santiago Sierra, Rodrigo Crespo and Ameyalli Negrete of Sonoro Media in partnership with iHeart Radio's My Cultura Podcast network. 

If you want to support the podcast, please rate and review our show.

Follow Lilliana Vazquez on Instagram and Twitter @lillianavazquez 

Follow Joseph Carrillo on Instagram @josephcarrillo

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
